patthana1.6:1.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ
patthana1.6:1.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā.
patthana1.6:2.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesike khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.6:3.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko
patthana1.6:3.1_1: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo
patthana1.6:3.1_2: khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ.
patthana1.6:4.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati
patthana1.6:4.1_1: hetupaccayā—asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca
patthana1.6:4.1_2: rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.6:4.1_3: asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.6:4.1_4: dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ; khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ
patthana1.6:4.1_5: paṭicca khandhā; ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā …pe… mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ
patthana1.6:5.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati
patthana1.6:5.1_1: hetupaccayā—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve
patthana1.6:6.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesike khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.6:7.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko
patthana1.6:7.1_1: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca
patthana1.6:7.1_2: tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ.
patthana1.6:8.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca
patthana1.6:9.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca
patthana1.6:10.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte
patthana1.6:10.1_1: nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye nava, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi,
patthana1.6:10.1_2: kamme nava, vipāke pañca, āhāre nava …pe… magge nava, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte
patthana1.6:12.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate
patthana1.6:12.1_1: uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.6:13.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati
patthana1.6:13.1_1: nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā
patthana1.6:13.1_2: cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… asaññasattānaṁ ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana1.6:15.1_0: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā cha, naanantare pañca …pe… naupanissaye
patthana1.6:15.1_1: pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke
patthana1.6:15.1_2: nava, naāhāre ekaṁ …pe… namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā
patthana1.6:16.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā cha …pe… napurejāte satta, napacchājāte
patthana1.6:16.1_1: nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte
patthana1.6:17.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… magge ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana1.6:20.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:21.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:22.1_1: ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.6:23.1_2: rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.6:23.1_3: khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:24.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:25.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:26.1_1: ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.6:27.1_1: paccayo—rāgaṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati,
patthana1.6:27.1_2: vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ uppajjati, domanassaṁ uppajjati. Diṭṭhiṁ assādeti
patthana1.6:27.1_3: …pe… vicikicchaṁ ārabbha …pe… uddhaccaṁ ārabbha …pe… domanassaṁ ārabbha …pe….
patthana1.6:29.1_1: paccayo—ariyā pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe
patthana1.6:29.1_2: samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti, saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesike khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato
patthana1.6:29.1_4: sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesike khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato
patthana1.6:29.1_5: vipassanti, kusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati; saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesike
patthana1.6:29.1_6: khandhe assādenti abhinandanti …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati, akusale niruddhe vipāko
patthana1.6:29.1_7: tadārammaṇatā uppajjati. Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa,
patthana1.6:30.1_1: paccayo—dānaṁ datvā, sīlaṁ samādiyitvā, uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati, pubbe
patthana1.6:30.1_2: suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati; jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ paccavekkhati, ariyā gotrabhuṁ
patthana1.6:30.1_3: paccavekkhanti, vodānaṁ paccavekkhanti, cakkhuṁ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti;
patthana1.6:30.1_4: sotaṁ … ghānaṁ … jivhaṁ … kāyaṁ … rūpe … sadde … gandhe … rase … phoṭṭhabbe … vatthuṁ
patthana1.6:30.1_5: asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesike khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti; dibbena cakkhunā
patthana1.6:30.1_6: rūpaṁ passanti, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇanti, cetopariyañāṇena asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikacittasamaṅgissa
patthana1.6:30.1_7: cittaṁ jānanti. Ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ viññāṇañcāyatanassa …pe… ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa
patthana1.6:30.1_8: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo
patthana1.6:31.1_1: paccayo—dānaṁ datvā, sīlaṁ samādiyitvā, uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.6:31.1_2: taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati; pubbe suciṇṇāni
patthana1.6:31.1_3: assādeti …pe… jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ assādeti …pe… cakkhuṁ assādeti. Phoṭṭhabbe
patthana1.6:31.1_4: … vatthuṁ … asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesike khandhe assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo
patthana1.6:32.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—nibbānaṁ maggassa, phalassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:33.1_1: paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, phalaṁ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ
patthana1.6:33.1_2: paccavekkhanti. Nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:33.1_3: Ariyā cetopariyañāṇena asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānanti. Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā
patthana1.6:34.1_1: paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati—rāgaṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti
patthana1.6:34.1_2: abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati; diṭṭhiṁ garuṁ katvā
patthana1.6:34.1_3: assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. Sahajātādhipati—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikādhipati
patthana1.6:36.1_2: sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:37.1_1: paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati—dānaṁ datvā, sīlaṁ samādiyitvā,
patthana1.6:37.1_2: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati,
patthana1.6:37.1_3: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, sekkhā gotrabhuṁ garuṁ katvā
patthana1.6:37.1_5: sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:38.1_1: paccayo. Ārammaṇādhipati—dānaṁ datvā, sīlaṁ samādiyitvā, uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ
patthana1.6:38.1_2: garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati,
patthana1.6:38.1_3: pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati …pe… jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ garuṁ
patthana1.6:38.1_4: katvā assādeti abhinandati …pe… cakkhuṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati …pe… phoṭṭhabbe
patthana1.6:38.1_5: …pe… vatthuṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesike khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ
patthana1.6:38.1_6: garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.6:40.1_2: maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ garuṁ
patthana1.6:40.1_3: katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:41.1_2: sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:42.1_1: paccayo—purimā purimā saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikānaṁ
patthana1.6:43.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:44.1_1: paccayo—purimā purimā asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikānaṁ
patthana1.6:44.1_2: khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo. Anulomaṁ gotrabhussa … anulomaṁ vodānassa …
patthana1.6:45.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—āvajjanā saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:46.1_1: paccayo—gotrabhu maggassa … vodānaṁ maggassa … anulomaṁ phalasamāpattiyā … nirodhā
patthana1.6:47.1_1: paccayo—purimā purimā asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikānaṁ
patthana1.6:47.1_2: khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo. Maggo phalassa … phalaṁ phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:48.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—phalaṁ vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:49.1_1: paccayo …pe… sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena
patthana1.6:49.1_3: …pe…. Pakatūpanissayo—rāgaṁ upanissāya pāṇaṁ hanati …pe… saṅghaṁ bhindati …pe… dosaṁ
patthana1.6:49.1_4: upanissāya pāṇaṁ hanati …pe… saṅghaṁ bhindati. Rāgo …pe… patthanā rāgassa …pe… patthanāya
patthana1.6:49.1_5: upanissayapaccayena paccayo. Pāṇātipāto pāṇātipātassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo
patthana1.6:50.1_2: dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti, jhānaṁ … vipassanaṁ … abhiññaṁ
patthana1.6:50.1_3: uppādeti, samāpattiṁ uppādeti …pe… patthanaṁ upanissāya dānaṁ deti …pe… samāpattiṁ
patthana1.6:50.1_4: uppādeti. Rāgo …pe… patthanā. Saddhāya …pe… kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa
patthana1.6:50.1_5: upanissayapaccayena paccayo. Pāṇaṁ hantvā tassa paṭighātatthāya dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ
patthana1.6:50.1_6: samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti, jhānaṁ uppādeti, vipassanaṁ uppādeti, abhiññaṁ
patthana1.6:50.1_7: uppādeti, samāpattiṁ uppādeti …pe… saṅghaṁ bhinditvā tassa paṭighātatthāya dānaṁ
patthana1.6:50.1_8: deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti. Akusalaṁ kammaṁ vipākassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:51.1_1: paccayo. Pakatūpanissayo—rāgaṁ upanissāya maggaṁ uppādeti, phalasamāpattiṁ samāpajjati.
patthana1.6:51.1_2: Dosaṁ …pe… patthanaṁ upanissāya maggaṁ uppādeti, phalasamāpattiṁ samāpajjati. Rāgo
patthana1.6:52.1_2: upanissāya dānaṁ deti …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti. Sīlaṁ … sutaṁ … cāgaṁ … paññaṁ …
patthana1.6:52.1_3: kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ … kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ … utuṁ … bhojanaṁ … senāsanaṁ upanissāya dānaṁ deti
patthana1.6:52.1_4: …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti. Saddhā …pe… senāsanaṁ saddhāya …pe… kāyikassa sukhassa,
patthana1.6:52.1_5: kāyikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. Kusalaṁ kammaṁ vipākassa upanissayapaccayena
patthana1.6:52.1_6: paccayo. Paṭhamassa jhānassa parikammaṁ paṭhamassa jhānassa …pe… ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ
patthana1.6:53.1_2: upanissāya mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti; sīlaṁ …pe… senāsanaṁ upanissāya pāṇaṁ
patthana1.6:53.1_3: hanati …pe… saṅghaṁ bhindati, saddhā …pe… senāsanaṁ rāgassa …pe… patthanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:54.1_2: parikammaṁ paṭhamassa maggassa …pe… dutiyassa maggassa …pe… tatiyassa maggassa …pe…
patthana1.6:55.1_2: maggo dutiyassa maggassa …pe… dutiyo maggo tatiyassa maggassa …pe… tatiyo maggo catutthassa
patthana1.6:56.1_2: maggaṁ upanissāya anuppannaṁ samāpattiṁ uppādenti, uppannaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpajjanti,
patthana1.6:56.1_3: saṅkhāre aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti. Maggo ariyānaṁ atthappaṭisambhidāya
patthana1.6:57.1_2: anattato vipassati; sotaṁ … ghānaṁ … jivhaṁ … kāyaṁ … rūpe … sadde … gandhe … rase
patthana1.6:57.1_3: … phoṭṭhabbe … vatthuṁ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ
patthana1.6:57.1_4: passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti. Rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ
patthana1.6:57.1_6: …pe… kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo. Vatthu asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikānaṁ
patthana1.6:58.1_2: taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati. Sotaṁ …pe… phoṭṭhabbe … vatthuṁ
patthana1.6:58.1_3: assādeti abhinandati; taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati. Vatthupurejātaṁ—vatthu
patthana1.6:59.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—vatthu asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:60.1_1: paccayo—pacchājātā saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:61.1_1: paccayo—pacchājātā asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:62.1_1: paccayo—pacchājātā asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:63.1_1: paccayo—purimā purimā saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikānaṁ
patthana1.6:64.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā …pe… anulomaṁ gotrabhussa … anulomaṁ vodānassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:65.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—gotrabhu maggassa … vodānaṁ maggassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:66.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:67.1_2: rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo. Nānākkhaṇikā—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā cetanā vipākānaṁ
patthana1.6:67.1_3: khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:68.1_1: ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.6:69.1_2: khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.6:69.1_3: …pe…. Nānākkhaṇikā—asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca
patthana1.6:70.1_2: khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo. Nānākkhaṇikā—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā kusalā cetanā
patthana1.6:71.1_1: paccayo—sahajātā asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:72.1_1: ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.6:73.1_1: paccayo—vipāko asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca
patthana1.6:73.1_2: rūpānaṁ vipākapaccayena paccayo …pe… dve khandhā dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.6:73.1_3: asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ vipākapaccayena
patthana1.6:73.1_4: paccayo …pe… dve khandhā dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe… khandhā vatthussa vipākapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:74.1_1: paccayo—vipāko asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ vipākapaccayena
patthana1.6:75.1_1: paccayo—vipākā asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vipākapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:76.1_1: ca dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—vipāko asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko eko khandho
patthana1.6:76.1_2: tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ vipākapaccayena paccayo …pe… dve khandhā …pe….
patthana1.6:77.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana1.6:78.1_2: rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa
patthana1.6:79.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana1.6:80.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana1.6:81.1_2: rūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… cakkhundriyaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa
patthana1.6:83.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa jhānapaccayena paccayo … maggapaccayena paccayo … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:84.1_2: rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā purejātassa
patthana1.6:85.1_2: cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā
patthana1.6:85.1_3: khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Khandhā vatthussa …pe… vatthu
patthana1.6:85.1_5: …pe… kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Vatthu asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikānaṁ
patthana1.6:86.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Purejātaṁ—vatthu saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikānaṁ khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:87.1_1: paccayo. Purejātaṁ—vatthu asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikānaṁ khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:89.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:90.1_2: rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā purejātassa
patthana1.6:91.1_1: ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ
patthana1.6:91.1_2: khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe… dve khandhā …pe….
patthana1.6:92.1_1: paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. Sahajāto—asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko
patthana1.6:92.1_2: eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo
patthana1.6:92.1_3: …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… asaññasattānaṁ ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ tiṇṇannaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ
patthana1.6:92.1_4: atthipaccayena paccayo …pe… purejātaṁ—cakkhuṁ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati.
patthana1.6:92.1_5: Sotaṁ …pe… kāyaṁ … rūpe …pe… phoṭṭhabbe … vatthuṁ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati,
patthana1.6:92.1_6: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti. Rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa
patthana1.6:92.1_7: …pe… phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa
patthana1.6:92.1_9: atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā—asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā purejātassa imassa
patthana1.6:92.1_10: kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Kabaḷīkāro āhāro—imassa kāyassa …pe…. Rūpajīvitindriyaṁ—kaṭattārūpānaṁ
patthana1.6:93.1_1: paccayo. Purejātaṁ—cakkhuṁ assādeti abhinandati; taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana1.6:93.1_2: domanassaṁ uppajjati; vatthuṁ assādeti …pe… vatthu saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.6:94.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Purejātaṁ—vatthu asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:95.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo ….
patthana1.6:96.1_2: rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā khandhā purejātassa
patthana1.6:97.1_1: ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ
patthana1.6:98.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa
patthana1.6:98.1_1: dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. Sahajātā—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā
patthana1.6:98.1_2: khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā
patthana1.6:98.1_3: khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā—asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā
patthana1.6:98.1_4: khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:99.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa
patthana1.6:99.1_2: eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe….
patthana1.6:100.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa
patthana1.6:100.1_2: eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo … dve khandhā …pe….
patthana1.6:101.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa
patthana1.6:101.1_1: dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. Sahajātā—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā
patthana1.6:101.1_2: khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā
patthana1.6:101.1_3: khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:101.1_4: Pacchājātā—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:102.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:103.1_0: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā aṭṭha, anantare satta, samanantare satta,
patthana1.6:103.1_1: sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye aṭṭha, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte
patthana1.6:103.1_2: tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke cattāri, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne
patthana1.6:103.1_3: satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā satta,
patthana1.6:104.1_0: Hetupaccayā adhipatiyā cattāri, sahajāte satta, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye satta, vipāke
patthana1.6:104.1_1: cattāri, indriye cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā
patthana1.6:105.1_0: Hetu sahajāta nissaya atthi avigatanti satta. Hetu sahajāta aññamañña nissaya atthi
patthana1.6:105.1_1: avigatanti tīṇi. Hetu sahajāta aññamañña nissaya sampayutta atthi avigatanti tīṇi.
patthana1.6:105.1_2: Hetu sahajāta nissaya vippayutta atthi avigatanti tīṇi. [Avipāka—4]
patthana1.6:106.1_0: Hetu sahajāta nissaya vipāka atthi avigatanti cattāri. Hetu sahajāta aññamañña nissaya
patthana1.6:106.1_1: vipāka atthi avigatanti dve. Hetu sahajāta aññamañña nissaya vipāka sampayutta atthi
patthana1.6:106.1_2: avigatanti dve. Hetu sahajāta nissaya vipāka vippayutta atthi avigatanti dve. Hetu
patthana1.6:106.1_3: sahajāta aññamañña nissaya vipāka vippayutta atthi avigatanti ekaṁ. [Savipāka—5] (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana1.6:108.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:109.1_1: paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena
patthana1.6:110.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:111.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa ca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:112.1_1: paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena
patthana1.6:112.1_2: paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo
patthana1.6:113.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:114.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:115.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:116.1_1: paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:117.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa ca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:118.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.6:119.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.6:120.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.6:121.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.6:122.1_0: Nahetuyā cuddasa, naārammaṇe cuddasa, naadhipatiyā cuddasa, naanantare cuddasa, nasamanantare
patthana1.6:122.1_1: cuddasa, nasahajāte dasa, naaññamaññe dasa, nanissaye dasa, naupanissaye terasa,
patthana1.6:122.1_2: napurejāte dvādasa, napacchājāte cuddasa, naāsevane cuddasa, nakamme cuddasa, navipāke
patthana1.6:122.1_3: cuddasa, naāhāre cuddasa, naindriye cuddasa, najhāne cuddasa, namagge cuddasa, nasampayutte
patthana1.6:122.1_4: dasa, navippayutte aṭṭha, noatthiyā aṭṭha, nonatthiyā cuddasa, novigate cuddasa, noavigate aṭṭha.
patthana1.6:125.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare
patthana1.6:125.1_1: satta, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte satta,
patthana1.6:125.1_2: naāsevane satta, nakamme satta, navipāke satta, naāhāre satta, naindriye satta, najhāne
patthana1.6:125.1_3: satta, namagge satta, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta.
patthana1.6:126.1: Hetu sahajāta nissaya atthi avigatanti naārammaṇe satta …pe… naaññamaññe tīṇi …pe… nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi …pe… novigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana1.6:129.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā aṭṭha, anantare satta, samanantare satta,
patthana1.6:129.1_1: sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye aṭṭha, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte
patthana1.6:129.1_2: tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke cattāri, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne
patthana1.6:129.1_3: satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā satta,
